body: The guy who commented about this not taking skill clearly does not know what goes into drawing stuff.
Lol people are salty cause they can't draw themselves, smh. They wouldn't't know talent if it was right on a platter in front of them. Anyways Oni doing gods work as usual.

@iwanttoshinu It is not incompleted. It is a limited bonus book from C93. 
Thanks for the uploader for sharing my scans here. #Thumbsup

Yeah more of the same
Meh
Draw like him then you can talk about skills lmao
Yopparai Oni is not skilless though. This is like an incomplete project, Alp has done this too. And these doujins are not uploaded by the artists...
Nothing to see here, just a skilless "artist" posting 3 effortless quickies in a row to get attention. You can go on.
ive marked my territory here thanks
